entries.fs_response07: I can't believe they used chemical weapons on us. We're all going to die!
entries.fs_response06: Better... Better get a bucket I'm going to throw up.
entries.fs_response05: They must have used bio-weapons. I'm sure of it! Doc, are you sure you can cure viral agents?
entries.fs_response03: Doc, why are we so sick? I didn't even get shot!
entries.fs_response02: My stomach. It feels like it's going to burst!
entries.fs_response01: Oh... I feel like I'm going to...
